Major revision2020

Create CITATION

adding the CITATION file

Update chicWrapper.R

adjusting the error message suggesting to use one of the generic models (target parameter): "TF", "broad", "sharp", "RNAPol2" in case the specific user-provided target is not available

Update chicWrapper.R

fixing the ifelse statement about plotting additional comparison plots (which are available only for individual markers, not for the generic "broad, sharp, RNAPol2" classes

fixing the handling of supported genomes

improved f_read.bam.tags

improved f_read.bam.tags doing a quick check if read pairs are present, then processing the data as more appropriate
also added a filter to remove unused levels in the chromosome names factor (to avoid output taglist with NULL vectors for some chromosomes listed in the BAM header but without reads)

force read.tag.names=TRUE for paired end reads BAM files

force read.tag.names=TRUE for paired end reads BAM files

fixed faulty ifelse in f_read.bam.tags

fixed faulty ifelse in f_read.bam.tags to handle cases where only one read in the pair is reported in the BAM file

Update privateFunctions.R

fixed f_chromInfoLoad  and f_annotationLoad functions, so that now the ifelse structure does not have a loophole without any valid TRUE exit.
If the selected annotation type is not inlcuded among the supporte dones, now the code is returning an error message and stopping the execution.

update f_read.bam.tags 

setting read.tag.names=TRUE by default to be able to handle paired end reads BAM files
I only closed changed the condition to allow saving the crosscorrelation plot also in wrapper mode

Changed variables smoothedDensityInput(and Chip). The nemes of field returned from qualityScores_EM are changed, so i changed this named to take the right field.( from CC_Result$TagDensityInput ---> CC_Result$SelectedTagsInput ).
I also added these variable in functions qualityScores_GM and createMetageneProfile.
Added parameter mc both in chicWrapper and qualityScores_GM
Removed the parameter debug from function qualityScores_LM.

Future Suggestion : could be useful add a starting check to verify if a name of histon mark o tf is present in compendium ?  Otherwhise the chicWrapper take a lot of time to compute all the analysis but no output will be saved if the mark is not present.

updating f_readFile()

adding ifelse to handle exceptions on the format of input files

adding  f_read.bam.tags  

to handle paired reads BAM files

Merge pull request #1 from carmencita/master

Updating ChIC to the newest version

- Removed the previous addition of as.integer on line 823
- Wasn't able to solve the INTEGER() DOUBLE() error from parallel.
- Now, find.binding.positions is taking cluster param as a NULL value
- So, hopefully we don't see that wretched error again.
- This will result in a significant package slowdown.
